1.1.0.en: Fixed memory leak and optimized code.

1.2.0.en: Updated tedee API to v1.21 and added Homey Cloud compatibility.

1.4.0.en: Added keypad support. Updated / added lock settings. Improved (cloud) stability. Deprecated lock opened trigger. Updated tedee API to v1.28. Bug fixes.

1.6.0.en: Tedee GO support. Stability and performance improvements.

1.6.1.en: Updated store information. Improved flow cards and logging.

1.7.0.en: Updated store- and driver information. Added multiple device settings.

1.7.1.en: Updated Tedee GO flows. Improved open capability flow.
